text: Ewa Lewandowska (born 4 September 1961) is a Polish rower. She competed in the women's eight event at the 1980 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Polish female rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Poland Category:Rowers at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Gorzów Wielkopolski
title: Ewa Lewandowska
